title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Quidi Vidi – St. John’s, NL
content:
Photo submitted by Paddy Snow, “A peaceful reminder at the beginning of a night ride, how spoiled we are to live where we do. Quidi Vidi is a small fishing village on the most eastern coast of Canada in the province of Newfoundland and Labrador. (Photo Credit Mike Pottle.)” We always love seeing photos from […]

author: Kristi Benedict
